title: Hospitality Practical Competency Enhancement: AR/VR-Based TSED Pedagogy for Mathematics Teacher Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and knowledge of mathematics curriculum content
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more AR/VR educational scenarios for math concepts using the TSED (Technology-Enhanced, Scenario-Based, Experiential Design) approach
Learners can develop and execute five or more math experimental activities using smartphone-based AR/VR tools and evaluate their effectiveness
Based on peer feedback, learners can improve AR/VR math educational materials created during the PBL (Project-Based Learning) process and apply them to actual classes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
